attributes.action: 50% of gym memberships ‘Help out, Workout’ to help get the nation healthier.
attributes.additional_details: ‘Help out, Workout’ 50% of all gym members for 6 months. The fitness industry needs your help, the nation needs your help. We need to give the nation an incentive to get in the gym and get healthier.
attributes.background: With nearly one in three adults in the UK being clinically obese. Studies have estimated that having a BMI 35-40 increase the person of dying from covid by 40% while a BMI greater than 40 could increase this risk by 90%. We need to get the country healthier. To tackle the death rate of COVID -19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332902
